text: اذا تتلى عليه ءايتنا قال اسطير الاولين

translations.translation: When Our Signs are recited to him, he says, 'Just myths of previous peoples!'
When you recite Our revelations to him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."
and whenever Our verses are rehearsed to him, he says: “These are fairy- tales of times gone by.”
When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “These are stories of earlier people.”
When Our Ayat are recited to him, he says: "Tales of the men of old!"
When Our communications are recited to him, he says: Stories of those of yore.
When Our signs are recited to him, he says, 'Fairy-tales of the ancients!'
That, when Our revelations are recited unto him, he saith: Mere fables of the men of old.
when Our revelations are recited to him, he says, "These are just ancient fables."
When Our revelations are rehearsed Unto him, he saith: fables of the ancients.
When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ‘Myths of the ancients!’
When to him are rehearsed Our Signs, "Tales of the ancients", he cries!
When Our Verses (of the Quran) are recited to him, he says: "Tales of the men of old!"
When Our verses are recited to him, he says: 'They are but fairytales of the ancients'
When Our Verses are recited to him, he says, “Myths of the ancients!”
When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

[68:15] When Our signs — the Qur’ān — are recited to him, he says, that they are [merely], ‘Fables of the ancients!’, in other words, he denies them [in arrogance] on account of the mentioned things which We have bestowed on him out of Our grace (a variant reading [for an of the previous verse] has [the interrogative] a-an).
(That, when Our revelations) the Qur'an, detailing the commands and prohibitions (are recited unto him, he saith: Mere fables of the men of old) this is just the talk and lies of the men of old.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وكمالات أسمائنا وصفاتنا { قَالَ } من كمال كفره وكفرانه
 وبغيه وعدوانه: ما هذا إلاَّ { أَسَاطِيرُ ٱلأَوَّلِينَ } [القلم: 15] أي: الأكاذيب القديمة التي سطرها الأولون ودونوها


قيل: هذا الوليد بن المغيرة الذي جمع الله فيه هذه المثالب الذميمة
